data.description:
For the next 3 rounds (including the round you activate this), the effects of your GRAVITY WELL change to the following:

  • At the end of each of your turns, pull all foes within Speed 3 to Match you, then Lock all Matched foes. If a foe is already Locked, Stun them.
  • Allies within Speed 3 gain +2 Weight.
  • Your Speed can ºt change for any reason.
